original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1191)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(451)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，且在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(169)@</color> 秒內對敵方武將造成混亂狀態。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1191)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(451)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy within its own range, and causes chaos to the enemy generals within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(169)@</color> seconds.
